backend/main.mo: Main actor module defining all types (GiftPack, Cart, Order, UserProfile, Coupon, etc.) and data stores (Maps for coupons, users, orders, payments, carts, etc.) for a gift pack e-commerce platform with Razorpay payment integration, blob storage mixin, and authorization mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining OldActor and NewActor types with identical structures containing all data stores, providing a run function that passes through the old actor unchanged for canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented admin authentication features: admin login page creation, protected admin route, and conditional admin navigation link visibility.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend React components and pages including routing, cart management with bigint quantities, checkout flow, admin authentication, product catalog, custom pack builder, and layout components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for UI elements (background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, borders, charts, sidebar).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Razorpay checkout script and mounting the React application at root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes, wrapping with AdminAuthProvider and ThemeProvider, initializing dummy data, and handling login/logout events to sync or clear cart state.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryFo: Reusable form component for creating or editing categories with name and description fields, validation, loading states, and cancel functionality for edit mode.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryLi: Displays a list of categories with loading skeletons, empty state, and optional edit buttons. Each category is shown in a card with name, description, and edit action.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: Manages category CRUD operations by combining CategoryForm and CategoryList components. Handles create/update mutations with toast notifications and edit state management.
frontend/src/components/admin/CouponForm: Form component for creating and editing coupons with fields for code, discount percentage, min/max discount constraints, expiration date, and quantity. Supports both create and edit modes with validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/CouponList: Displays coupons in a grid layout with status badges (Active/Expired/Sold Out), showing discount details, quantity remaining, expiration date, and optional edit buttons. Includes loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/CouponMana: Manages coupon CRUD operations by combining CouponForm and CouponList components. Handles create/update mutations with bigint date conversion and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/GiftPackFo: Form component for creating and editing gift packs with fields for ID, title, description, price, discount, category, images (dynamic array), basket type, and size. Uses react-hook-form with field arrays for multiple images.
frontend/src/components/admin/GiftPackLi: Displays gift packs in a grid with image previews, discount badges, and action buttons for edit/delete. Includes loading skeletons, error handling, empty state, and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/GiftPackMa: Admin component for managing gift packs with create, edit, and delete functionality using GiftPackForm and GiftPackList subcomponents.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: React Hook Form-based form component for creating and editing custom products with fields for ID, name, description, price, category, and multiple image URLs.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductLis: Displays a grid of custom products with edit and delete actions, showing product images, details, and category badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin component that orchestrates product CRUD operations with a toggleable form and product list, using toast notifications for feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedAd: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to admin login and shows a loading spinner during authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartItemRow: Displays a single cart item with image, price, quantity controls, custom message/wrapping details, and remove button.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSummary: Shows cart totals including subtotal, GST (18%), and final total with a checkout button that navigates to the checkout page.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Address: Delivery address form with pincode serviceability validation, phone/pincode format validation, and auto-population from user profile.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Displays a checkout order summary card showing cart items, subtotal, coupon discount, GST (18%), and total price with loading skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/customization/Ba: Renders a grid of selectable basket type cards (Wicker Basket, Wooden Crate, Gift Box) with icons, descriptions, and visual selection state.
frontend/src/components/customization/It: Displays a grid of selectable gift items with a maximum limit (default 12), showing mock items with prices, descriptions, and selection checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/customization/Me: Provides a textarea for entering an optional gift message with a 200-character limit and remaining character counter.
frontend/src/components/customization/Pa: Displays a grid of selectable packing style options (Classic Wrap, Premium Wrap, Gold Ribbon, Silver Ribbon) with color-coded visual indicators.
Shows a sticky sidebar preview of the custom gift pack including basket type, size, selected items with prices, packing style, message, and total price calculation.
frontend/src/components/customization/Pe: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/customization/Si: Renders selectable size cards (Small, Medium, Large) showing item capacity, description, and additional pricing for each size option.
frontend/src/components/customization/St: Displays a horizontal progress indicator with 5 steps (Basket Type, Size, Products, Packing, Message) showing completed, current, and upcoming states.
Provides Back and Next navigation buttons for multi-step forms with conditional enabling based on step validity and position.
frontend/src/components/delivery/Pincode: A card component that allows users to enter a 6-digit pincode and check if delivery is available to their area, displaying success or error messages based on the validation and backend response.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component displaying company information, quick navigation links, delivery info, social media icons, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header component with logo, navigation menu, pincode checker popover, cart icon with item count, and authentication controls for both regular users and admin access.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Root layout component that wraps the application with Header, main content outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/product/FilterSi: Sidebar component for filtering gift packs by category and price range, with responsive design showing as a card on desktop and a sheet on mobile.
frontend/src/components/product/GiftPack: Card component displaying a gift pack with image carousel, title, description, pricing with discount badge, and add-to-cart button.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductG: Grid layout component that renders a collection of GiftPackCard components or displays an empty state message when no products are found.
frontend/src/components/profile/OrderHis: Displays a single order card with expandable details, showing order ID, date, status badges (order and payment), total amount, and a collapsible list of items with pack IDs and quantities.

Renders the order history section with loading/error states, fetches orders using useOrderHistory hook, sorts them by date descending, and displays them using OrderHistoryCard components or an empty state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity, initializing access control with admin token, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: Provides admin authentication context with hardcoded credentials (admin/admin123), manages session state in localStorage, and exposes login/logout functions with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages shopping cart state with localStorage persistence and backend synchronization, providing functions to add/update/remove items, calculate totals with coupon discounts, and handle cart clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: React Query hook that fetches all categories from the backend actor, enabled only when the actor is initialized and not fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryMutation.t: Provides mutation hooks for creating and updating categories (update is placeholder), invalidating the categories query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: React Query mutation hook for submitting contact form data (name, email, phone, message) to the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoupon.ts: Provides coupon validation mutation that uppercases and trims codes, plus a utility function to calculate discount amounts based on coupon percentage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCouponMutation.ts: Provides mutations for creating and updating coupons with discount percentages, min/max amounts, expiration dates, and quantities; includes a placeholder query hook for fetching all coupons.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomProducts.ts: React Query hook that fetches all custom products from the backend actor, enabled only when the actor is initialized and not fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftPackMutation.t: Provides mutations for creating, updating, and deleting gift packs with image blob handling, invalidating gift pack queries on success, and showing toast notifications for all operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftPacks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching gift packs: all packs, filtered packs by catalog filters, and individual packs by ID using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication with React context, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and authentication status tracking using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrder.ts: Provides a mutation hook for creating orders with cart items, delivery address, payment details, and optional coupon codes, invalidating order history cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistory.ts: React Query hook that fetches the authenticated user's order history from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductMutation.ts: Provides mutation hooks for creating, updating, and deleting custom products with category, price, and image management (delete not yet implemented in backend).
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook to initialize backend data and invalidate gift packs cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRazorpay.ts: Custom hook for integrating Razorpay payment gateway, handling payment initiation with order details and processing payment success/failure callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides query and mutation hooks for fetching and updating user profile data including name, email, phone, address, and pincode.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (terracotta, sage green, cream) for light/dark themes and utility classes for the gift pack store design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login page with form validation using react-hook-form, authenticating via useAdminAuth hook and redirecting to admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying management interfaces for products, categories, coupons, and gift packs with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays shopping cart with items, quantities, and customization options; shows empty state with navigation to catalog/custom pack creation, and includes cart summary sidebar for checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Browse page for gift packs with search bar, filter sidebar, and product grid; displays loading skeletons while fetching filtered gift pack data.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow with Internet Identity login requirement, delivery address form, coupon validation/application, order summary, and Razorpay payment integration; creates orders and clears cart on success.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with fields for name, email, phone, and message; validates input and submits contact requests with success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/CustomPackPage.tsx: Multi-step wizard for creating custom gift packs: select basket type, size, items, packing type, and optional message card; validates each step and adds completed pack to cart.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights (curated collections, personalization, delivery), and featured gift packs grid with add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details including order ID, estimated delivery date, payment status, and payment ID retrieved from sessionStorage. Provides navigation buttons to return home or view order history.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page with form for personal details and delivery address, including real-time pincode serviceability checking. Includes order history section and requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/types/razorpay.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Razorpay payment gateway integration, including options, response, and instance interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation utilities for Indian pincode (6 digits) and phone number (10 digits) formats, with placeholder for delivery availability checking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme (terracotta, sage, cream), typography settings, animations, and shadcn/ui component styling using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document showing existing admin authentication features and pending feature requests for backend authentication system implementation.
